sqlMap.insert:
insert into jdbc_board (board_no, board_title, board_writer,board_date, board_cnt, board_content) values (board_seq.nextval, #board_title#, #board_writer#, sysdate, 0, #board_content#)
select BOARD_NO from jdbcBoard where = #board_no#
sqlMap.select: select board_no, board_title, board_writer, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_cnt, board_content from jdbc_board where board_no = #board_no#
select board_no, board_title, board_writer, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_cnt, board_content from jdbc_board order by board_no desc

select board_no, board_title, board_writer, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_cnt, board_content from jdbc_board where board_title like '%' || #board_title# || '%' order by board_no desc
sqlMap.update: update jdbc_board set board_cnt = board_cnt + 1 where board_no = #board_no#
